main event: Lawrance Fisher, a crop farmer, observed a small round light in the sky traveling very fast over St. Louis, Missouri.
interesting points: The light was roughly the size of a basketball and had a bluish-white color., It was traveling from the West at a very high rate of speed., The object made no sound and disappeared in about 5-6 seconds., The witness was surprised and somewhat startled by the sighting., Fisher stated it was definitely not an airplane, satellite, or any known object he was familiar with.
sighted object: a small round light in the sky
